## Welcome

This is the unofficial course website for BIO 453: Ecology at William Jewell College. This is my first attempt at creating a course with the distill package. Students enrolled in the course will still access the course on BrightSpace.

## Course Information

**Instructor** | Nathan A Jud PhD

**William Jewell College** | Biology Department | Fall 2024
